title: Dark Star Varus Auto Attack Sound Bug
body: One of this skin's most attractive feature is its auto attack sound... sadly the auto attack for this skin reverts to classic skin auto attack sound when you put a point in your 'W' (Blighted Quiver) for every game. Riot please fix this  as I spend quite a bit of money  on this skin and I'm not getting what I payed for. Thank you for your time!{{champion:110}}

replies.body: Hey friends, sorry this is happening, we'll get this fixed up right away. Do you recall if this is something new that started this patch?
Could you fix his crit animations and vfx on w?

> [{quoted}](name=Tomeksz,realm=EUNE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=mW46mNhi,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-04-16T17:35:39.121+0000)
>
> Could you fix his crit animations and vfx on w?

Would you mind being more specific?

His bow is no longer streching out when he crits.

His arrows have no longer blighted look when he shoots.

> [{quoted}](name=Tomeksz,realm=EUNE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=mW46mNhi,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2018-04-17T11:30:17.550+0000)
>
> His bow is no longer streching out when he crits.
> 
> His arrows have no longer blighted look when he shoots.

Gotcha, I've passed this along to Champion folks, they're going to take a look.
I noticed the same issue while playing today, very unfortunate as the auto attack sound is one of the reasons i bought the skin. As a {{champion:110}}  main i hope riot notices this lol
